item.title: Parts of Midwest brace for ice; Michigan first responders dash to safety during major crash
Trump opposes automation but the move carries tradeoffs, experts say
item.description: Automation causes "distress, hurt, and harm" for U.S. workers, Trump says.

item.title: UnitedHealthcare CEO killing latest: Former prosecutor to defend Mangione in New York
item.description: Luigi Mangione may waive extradition to New York City as early as Tuesday, Manhattan District Attorney Alvin Bragg said on Friday.

item.title: Willis rebuffs GOP lawmaker's request for documents, says Trump case is 'ongoing'

RFK Jr.'s lawyer and top ally asked FDA to revoke approval of polio vaccine
item.description: Robert F. Kennedy Jr.’s personal attorney previously lobbied the Food and Drug Administration to revoke approval of the polio vaccine.

item.title: McConnell warns RFK Jr. against effort to undermine polio vaccines
item.description: Aaron Siri, an attorney to Robert F. Kennedy Jr., petitioned the FDA to "withdraw or suspend" its approval of a polio vaccine.
